content: Bundled binaries (RetroForge Engine + Cart) are available for download from Arcade pages. These binaries:

items: Contain the Apache 2.0-licensed Engine (subject to Apache License 2.0 terms)
Contain cart files (subject to Terms of Service distribution restrictions)
Can be shared as downloaded from the Platform
Cannot be redistributed or modified beyond the original download
Must be distributed through the RetroForge Platform only

content: When you download a bundled binary, you are downloading both the Engine (Apache 2.0 licensed) and a cart (Terms of Service restricted). Both sets of terms apply.
